participant_1.name: Jasmine
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and lively, she loves the thrill of speed and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i have light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, he finds joy in connecting with others and sharing his passions.
participant_2.background: i attend church every week. i have a dogs. i work as a school teacher. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.
